.. _addGiottoPolygons:
``addGiottoPolygons``
=========================

Add giotto polygons to giotto object

Description
-----------

Adds Giotto polygon to an existing Giotto object

Usage
-----

.. code-block:: r

   addGiottoPolygons(gobject, gpolygons)

Arguments
---------

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Argument
     - Description
   * - ``gobject``
     - giotto object
   * - ``gpolygons``
     - list of giotto polygon objects, see `\ ``createGiottoPolygonsFromMask`` <#creategiottopolygonsfrommask>`_ and `\ ``createGiottoPolygonsFromDfr`` <#creategiottopolygonsfromdfr>`_


Value
-----

giotto object
